oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Matrix converter based grid connected system with reactive and harmonic compensation features
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: PATKI, C
AGARWAL, V
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: matrix converter (mc)
space vector modulation (svm)
harmonic compensation
reactive compensation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Matrix converters offer certain advantages over conventional AC-DC-AC conversion such as elimination of reactive elements, inherent bidirectional power flow capability, increased reliability and compactness. This paper explores the reactive and harmonic compensation capability of a matrix converter. Space vector modulation technique has been used for controlling the matrix converter. All the details of this work are presented.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: 2nd Global Conference on Power Control and Optimization,Bali, INDONESIA,JUN 01-03, 2009
